name: Giant Wolf Spider
movement: 40 feet on the ground and climbing
description: A Medium beast with exceptional climbing abilities and a deadly bite that delivers poison, allowing it to incapacitate prey effectively.
memorable: Its ability to paralyze victims with poisonous bites makes it a deadly ambush predator.
goals: To hunt and incapacitate prey using stealth and poison.
relations: Often found in the company of other ambush predators or in nests with young spiders.
environment: Commonly found in various terrains where it can climb and hide.
strengths: High agility and climbing capabilities allow for strategic positioning in combat.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence and Charisma make it vulnerable to magical effects and social challenges.
attacks: Uses a bite attack that deals piercing and additional poison damage, potentially paralyzing foes.
most_powerful_ability: Poisonous bite can paralyze prey for an hour if not saved against.
senses: Possesses keen senses with a high Stealth score of 16, making it adept at ambush tactics.
skills: Skilled in stealth, allowing it to sneak up on unsuspecting victims.
additional_information: Can climb difficult surfaces without rolling for success.
Has a unique jumping ability to quickly close distances.
Makes strategic leaps that do not provoke opportunity attacks.
Ability to stabilize poisoned creatures prevents death.
Recognizable by its large size and predatory behavior.
